
```{r cardiotimebyEF}

tmp <- wdata %>%
  filter(EF == "rEF") %>%
  group_by(indexYear_cat) %>%
  count(clinic) %>%
  mutate(tot = sum(n)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(clinic == "cardiology")
pref <- prop.trend.test(tmp$n, tmp$tot)


tmp <- wdata %>%
  filter(EF == "mrEF") %>%
  group_by(indexYear_cat) %>%
  count(clinic) %>%
  mutate(tot = sum(n)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(clinic == "cardiology")
pmref <- prop.trend.test(tmp$n, tmp$tot)


tmp <- wdata %>%
  filter(EF == "pEF") %>%
  group_by(indexYear_cat) %>%
  count(clinic) %>%
  mutate(tot = sum(n)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(clinic == "cardiology")
ppef <- prop.trend.test(tmp$n, tmp$tot)

pall <- bind_cols(c("rEF", "mrEF", "pEF"), c(fn(pref$p.value, dig = 3, p = T), fn(pmref$p.value, dig = 3, p = T), fn(ppef$p.value, dig = 3, p = T)))

colnames(pall) <- c("EF", "p-value")

default_kable(pall,
  caption = "Test for trend between ward type and time period for each EF group seperatly",
  scale_down = F
)
```
